channel.title: Utorrent Problem
channel.description: I am in the process of makking a server and everything is going fine. I have edited and done everything there is s'pose to be done. now I downloaded uTorrent and installed. I opened it and set everything to what it's s'pose to be the port to 43594 and unchckec the randomize, ect. Now I clcik apply and exit uTorrent out of the taskbar and everything. Now i opened no-ip and check my host. Now i run my server and open uTorrent..NO one can still log in because i found this error: [2009-02-07 20:18:27] TCP port bind failed 0.0.0.0:43594: (10048) Only one usage of each socket address (protocol/network address/port) is normally permitted. in the "logger" tab. what does it mean and how can i fix it?

item.title: Utorrent Problem
item.dc:creator: @Thickertech Thickertech
item.description:
@Thickertech wrote:

modems cant portforward (not sure with all modems) only routers and modem/routers can

Read full topic

item.title: Utorrent Problem
item.dc:creator: @need_to_learn need to learn
item.description:
@need_to_learn wrote:

I asked this for my friend lol, he has a modem and says he can’t portforward? I’m not sure if modems can but he said he can’t…

Read full topic

item.title: Utorrent Problem
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Sorry, but we don’t solve problems in a matter such as this one; uTorrent is not only for opening ports, it’s a torrent, which isn’t related to private servers as this is server help.

Read full topic

item.title: Utorrent Problem
item.dc:creator: @need_to_learn need to learn
item.description:
@need_to_learn wrote:

I am in the process of makking a server and everything is going fine. I have edited and done everything there is s’pose to be done. now I downloaded uTorrent and installed. I opened it and set everything to what it’s s’pose to be the port to 43594 and unchckec the randomize, ect. Now I clcik apply and exit uTorrent out of the taskbar and everything. Now i opened no-ip and check my host. Now i run my server and open uTorrent…NO one can still log in because i found this error: [2009-02-07 20:18:27] TCP port bind failed 0.0.0.0:43594: (10048) Only one usage of each socket address (protocol/network address/port) is normally permitted.
in the “logger” tab. what does it mean and how can i fix it?

Read full topic
